name: Georgius
skill: Deals 2116/2596 DMG to the enemy with the most HP. Targets take 45/55% more DMG for a limited time.
ability: Slightly increases the ATK speed of all allies.
Slightly reduces DMG received for all melee allies.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a priest from ancient Rome who killed a dragon in order to spread Christianity. A curse from Yamata-no-Orochi turned him into a woman, but now she actually likes it better than being a man. It's much easier to convert people, for one thing. Her missionary work is getting out of control, actually — there have even been reports of injuries.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 17/8/16 - 7/9/16
◦ Trade at Exchange for 100 Mochi 4/9/16 - 7/9/16
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦  Increases the Event Points gained by 20% during the "Is this Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-" event.
◦ Summon rate increased 17/8/16 - 7/9/16

main: "It's not so bad being a woman!"
summon: "I'll protect you from the fire and brimstone, as long as you read the Bible!"
limit_break: "Now I can convert more people than ever!"
